name: recipesage
description: RecipeSage is a self-hosted recipe manager with tagging, meal planning, ingredient scaling, and import features. It includes a mobile-friendly UI for organizing and cooking at home.
features: Recipe import: Extract recipes from websites automatically by pasting URLs into the app.
Ingredient scaling: Adjust serving sizes and automatically recalculate ingredient quantities.
Meal planning: Schedule recipes on a calendar to plan weekly or monthly menus.
Shopping lists: Generate grocery lists from planned meals with automatic ingredient aggregation.
Tag organization: Categorize recipes with custom tags like cuisine type, dietary restrictions, or meal type.
Recipe sharing: Share favorite recipes with family and friends through shareable links.
Image upload: Add photos of your finished dishes to personalize recipe cards.
Cooking mode: Display recipes in a large, easy-to-read format while cooking in the kitchen.
Search and filter: Find recipes quickly by ingredient, tag, or full-text search.
Nutrition tracking: View nutritional information for recipes when available from source websites.
Recipe collections: Organize recipes into collections like "Quick Dinners" or "Holiday Baking".
Mobile apps: Access your recipe library from iOS and Android devices with native applications.
